short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click the extension icon while on any tab to open it from within LUMS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension allows you to use the LUMS VPN for any website, as long as you have credentials. You can use it to access academic journal websites from the LUMS network.
